TEXT.TITLE: ALLERGY GETS GRANT TO DEVELOP INTERLEUKIN KIT
TEXT.BODY: Allergy Immuno Technologies Inc said it received federal funding to develop a diagnostic kit for measuring Interleukin-2 and Interleukin-2 receptor. Interleukin is a naturally produced substance important in maintaining the body's immune system. Reuter
